thread.title: Re: Protest in Philadelphia: Police injured and American flag burned
thread.title_full: Re: Protest in Philadelphia: Police injured and American flag burned

author: Marvin Nelson
title: Re: Protest in Philadelphia: Police injured and American flag burned
text:
Posted at 9:05 pm on February 17, 2017 by William A. 
A protest against police violence turned ugly Friday night in Philadelphia: WATCH LIVE: Chopper 3 is over #Philadelphia as protesters block #BroadStreet . Details: https://t.co/AEWQSL5NmZ pic.twitter.com/LKzwmlsexK 
— CBS Philly (@CBSPhilly) February 18, 2017 
We’re seeing reports that officers were injured and an American flag burned: #UPDATE : Official says "it appears officers were injured" after skirmish broke out during protest https://t.co/z53K0xGg8m 
— CBS Philly (@CBSPhilly) February 18, 2017 About 100 people gathered across from City Hall to protest police abuses and then marched up Broad Street. https://t.co/MQx6nSgJsL 
— Philly.com (@phillydotcom) February 18, 2017 
Some tweets: Covering a protest in Philly, about 200 ppl. General sentiment: fuck police, fuck Trump, fuck ICE, fuck racism, fuck the democrats. Also: pic.twitter.com/lEuO8r6k4G 
— Joshua Scott Albert (@jpegjoshua) February 17, 2017 Philly protesters brought their own shields pic.twitter.com/i2kWnauYqO 
— Joshua Scott Albert (@jpegjoshua) February 17, 2017 #Philly protest right now, "ungovernable" as flag burns. pic.twitter.com/NLYVnfpYlu 
— Joshua Scott Albert (@jpegjoshua) February 17, 2017 Protesters now chanting "no good cop but a dead one." https://t.co/U41zIaENwK 
— Joshua Scott Albert (@jpegjoshua) February 17, 2017 Philly protesters and police fighting, multiple maced pic.twitter.com/0ITe9zWfGv
